title: OCE Boards is Actually Lit
body: Hey all, just wanted to let you know that our boards is actually the coolest. Like seriously, no other region does the near monthly, riot run competitions that we do. And no other region has stuff like Ocean week. We are actually so privileged. If only we had PBE...

replies.body: If only, WE HAD NORMAL DRAFTS AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

>
> If only, WE HAD NORMAL DRAFTS AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

I feel ya, would much rather have normal drafts in place of blind pick.
